review_blob: Loved the Pollenater even more so than my normal Long Trail Ale IPA. Great summer beer for those long dusky into night evenings  with friends and food. great taste and refreshing flavors meld with a nice colorization. Super if you can get it on tap but from the bottle it is just as good

beer_brewer_name: Magic Hat Brewing Company (North American Breweries)
review_blob: One of the harder to find selections made by Magic Hat, this beer is always a "comfort ale" that I have enjoyed while in Vermont. It has a clean crisp taste that falls in line similar to Magic hat #9s style. I like the "amberish" color and the medium size head of Single Chair. Great taste.

One of the absolute beers that I never pass up when given the chance. Cold crisp and clear and a great beer for any meal. The design and feel of the bottle is perfect for outdoor parties and events. The awards bestowed on this beer over the years are all duly earned. this beer has no after taste and the refreshing taste is what i love in a beer
Always a favorite when I am in Chicago, just enjoyed a few in Missouri as I waited out the snow storm of 2011. I wish i could get it in Miami
